translation.en: [David Attenborough impersonation] In a time when Mother Nature
translation.es: En un momento en que la madre naturaleza

translation.en: was still just a babe in the wood...
translation.es: solo era un bebé en el bosque,

translation.en: ...she dreamed a barren planet
translation.es: ella soñó acerca de un planeta estéril

translation.en: would someday teem...
...with majestic beings
both great...
and small.
And when her wondrous vision came to pass,
translation.es: Y cuando su maravillosa visiónse hizo realidad,

translation.en: she gazed upon the primordial ooze
and realized,
that she still had some leftover ooze.
translation.es: que aún tenía un poco de líquido sobrante.

translation.en: And from those remaining glops of goo,
translation.es: Y de aquellos restosde sustancia pegajosa y babosa,

translation.en: she created our...
Absurd Planet!
Ladies and gentlemen,
give it up for...
Mother... Nature! [fades out]
-[birds chirping] -[Mother Nature] Yes! Hallelujah!
I am Mother Nature, and that's right,
translation.es: Soy la Madre Naturaleza y eso es correcto:

translation.en: I did create some of the most spectacular creatures
translation.es: Creé algunas de las criaturasmás espectaculares

translation.en: humankind has ever seen...
but I also made some pretty bizarre artistic choices.
translation.es: Pero también tomédecisiones artísticas bastante extrañas.

translation.en: Yep, somewhere along the line,
being strange got a bad rap.
Right, Mr. Mustache Face? [chuckles]
Just because something is weird,
doesn't mean it's not worthy.
translation.es: no significa que no sea digno.

translation.en: Got that, four-eyed rainbow butt?
And I'm here to proclaim
that different is good!
Can I get an amen,
my no-nosed, frozen-faced cutie pie?
translation.es: mi pastelillo de cara congelada sin nariz?

translation.en: [flamingos mutter] Strangest things.
Therefore, I present to you,
-my parade of oddities. -[slurping sound]
Rebels amongst regulars, that must truly be seen to be believed.
translation.es: Rebeldes entre los normales,que deben ser vistos para ser creídos.

translation.en: [high voice] From mini,
[deep voice] to maxi!
We begin this one... with number two.
translation.es: Empezamos con hacer del número dos.

translation.en: Dung beetles are insects that feed either partly or exclusively
translation.es: Los escarabajos peloteros son insectosque se alimentan parcial o exclusivamente

translation.en: on the feces of other animals.
translation.es: de las heces de otros animales.

translation.en: You thought your paleo diet was hard to stomach!
translation.es: Creías que tu dieta paleoera difícil de digerir.

translation.en: And just like those other Beatles,
translation.es: Y al igual que los famosos Beatles,

translation.en: these little rock stars are shooting right up the charts.
translation.es: estas pequeñas estrellas de rockestán subiendo en las listas.

translation.en: [announcer] Uh, ladies and gentlemen, The Dung Beetles!
♪ Here's a story 'bout a bug you know ♪
translation.es: De un insecto yo les voy a hablar

translation.en: ♪ They live on farms and grasslands, oh ♪
translation.es: Que vive en pradera y pastizal

translation.en: ♪ You see these critters Everywhere you go ♪
translation.es: Criaturas que hallas en cualquier lugar

translation.en: ♪ They don't care What kind of food they eat ♪
♪ This one's crazier than Fred VanVleet ♪
♪ Stick to their diet man They never cheat ♪
translation.es: No hacen trampa con su nutrición

translation.en: ♪ Dung beetles live for poo ♪
♪ Dung beetles eat it ewww ♪
♪ Dung beetles roll number two ♪
♪ Dung beetles and poo ♪
[girls screaming] Dung Beetles! Dung Beetles! Dung Beetles!
I love you, Rollie!
Oh my God, have my babies, Dwellie!
translation.es: CUERNITOS ¡Dios mío, ten a mis bebés!

translation.en: ♪ Dung beetles live for poo ♪
♪ Dung beetles eat it ewww ♪
♪ Dung beetles roll number two ♪
♪ Dung beetles and poo ♪
♪ So there's a scarab That you thought you knew ♪
♪ Five thousand species Only one loves poo ♪
translation.es: En cinco mil especies no hay igual

translation.en: ♪ Don't invite them to your barbecue ♪
translation.es: Si te invita a comer, dirás

translation.en: ♪ Dung beetles ewww! ♪
[Dung Beetle shouting] I've got feces on me pincers!
[slowed down] I... bury... poo.
Sorry, but this nightmare on elm tree
translation.es: Lo siento,pero esta Pesadilla en la Calle Olmo

translation.en: isn't much of a palate cleanser.
translation.es: no me quita el mal sabor de boca.

translation.en: It's the creepiest, crawliest thing I ever created.
translation.es: Es la cosa más escalofrianteque he creado.

translation.en: Centipedes.
The word "centipede" means "100-footed,"
which is odd, because most centipedes don't have a hundred feet.
translation.es: lo cual es extraño, porque la mayoríade los ciempiés no tienen cien pies.

translation.en: [sarcastically] Way to go, animal namers!
Either way, that's still a lot of slimy legs
translation.es: De todas formas,son muchas piernas viscosas

translation.en: to crawl across your face at night.
translation.es: para reptar por tu cara de noche.

translation.en: [centipede] See you in your dreams!
Centipedes thrive in dark, warm, humid environments,
translation.es: Los ciempiés crecen en ambientes oscuros,cálidos y húmedos,

translation.en: like South American rain forests,
or a hipster's beanie in the summertime.
translation.es: o un gorro de hipster en verano.

translation.en: Using their front two legs like fangs,
translation.es: Usando sus dos patas frontalescomo colmillos,

translation.en: centipedes inject their victim with venom,
translation.es: los ciempiés inyectan veneno a su víctima,

translation.en: then curl around the creature and wait patiently for it to expire.
translation.es: se enrollan alrededor de la criaturay esperan pacientemente a que expire.

translation.en: And they eat everything.
[caterpillar] Ooh, look at me, I'm dying.
Crickets,
spiders,
frogs,
lizards,
small rodents...
Uh, that's a caterpillar!
Couldn't find a rodent?
[centipede] It's "ro-dent."
Let's crawl over to Madagascar,
an island so incredibly strange and jam-packed with nutso creatures,
translation.es: una isla increíblemente extrañay atestada de criaturas chifladas,

translation.en: you basically have to be on fire to stand out.
translation.es: básicamente tienes que ser espectacularpara sobresalir.

translation.en: Now, everyone's crazy about geckos.
translation.es: Todos están enloquecidos por los gecos.

translation.en: They have sticky feet and adorbs little grins.
[gecko] Yep, I'm very popular.
But... deep within this exotic island
translation.es: Pero en lo profundo de esta isla exótica

translation.en: lives a member of the gecko family
translation.es: vive un miembro de la familia de los gecos

translation.en: they don't even want to talk about.
translation.es: del que ni siquiera quieren hablar.

translation.en: The satanic leaf-tailed gecko.
translation.es: El geco de cola de hoja satánico.

translation.en: ♪ Kill, kill, kill, kill ♪
Every family has its black sheep.
translation.es: Cada familia tiene su oveja negra.

translation.en: Even my... sheep.
This fallen angel of darkness
translation.es: Este ángel caído de la oscuridad

translation.en: has a flattened tail with notches
translation.es: tiene una cola aplanada con muescas

translation.en: to mimic a dying or decaying leaf.
translation.es: que imita una hoja marchitao en descomposición.

translation.en: They do this to blend into their habitat,
translation.es: Lo hacen para mezclarse con su hábitat

translation.en: and also because death and decay are wicked cool to demons!
translation.es: y también porque la muerte y la decadenciason geniales para los demonios.

translation.en: ♪ Death and decay Death and decay ♪
This one's so hardcore,
he just painted his bedroom black and screamed...
translation.es: que pintó su habitaciónde negro y gritó...

translation.en: [gecko teenager] You're not my real father!
...to someone who actually is his real father.
translation.es: ...a alguien que en verdades su verdadero padre.

translation.en: Lord Satan Gecko uses his long mobile tongue to wipe off dust and debris.
translation.es: Señor Satán Geco usa su larga lengua móvilpara limpiar polvo y escombros.

translation.en: ♪ Dust and debris, Dust and debris ♪
All of the aforementioned reasons are why the normal gecko family
translation.es: Todas las razones antes mencionadasson por qué la familia de gecos normales

translation.en: no longer invites the satanic leaf-tailed gecko
translation.es: ya no invita al satánico lagartode cola como hoja

translation.en: to Gecko Thanksgiving.
translation.es: a la Navidad de los Geco.

translation.en: ♪ Kill, kill, kill, kill ♪
[gecko teenager] Why am I always at the kids' table?
translation.es: ¿Por qué siempre estoyen la mesa de los niños?

translation.en: The low-lying wetlands of North America
translation.es: Los humedales llanos de América del Norte

translation.en: are peppered with funky-faced freakazoids.
translation.es: están salpicadosde monstruos de caras vibrantes.

translation.en: Like star-nosed moles,
translation.es: Como los topos de nariz estrellada,

translation.en: whose personalities range from mellow... to psycho!
translation.es: cuya personalidadva desde lo delicado a lo psicótico.

translation.en: To find evidence of them,
you just have to do a little digging.
translation.es: solo tienes que escarbar un poco.

translation.en: [mole] Hello.
My name is Buddy Sparkle,
and I'm a star-nosed mole attorney.
translation.es: soy un abogado topo de nariz estrellada.

translation.en: Your attorney.
YOUR attorney.
Friends, did you know, you already may be entitled
-to an absurd financial settlement? -[cash register rings]
Uh, excuse me, but what makes you such a great lawyer?
translation.es: Disculpe, pero¿qué lo hace tan buen abogado?

translation.en: First of all, let me ask the questions, Miss Nature.
translation.es: Primero, permítame hacer las preguntas,señorita Naturaleza.

translation.en: But also, that's a great question!
My snout is outfitted with 25,000 minute receptors,
translation.es: Mi hocico está equipadocon 25 000 ínfimos receptores

translation.en: each working to sniff out the best outcome for your wallet.
translation.es: y cada uno trabaja para rastrearel mejor resultado para su billetera.

translation.en: Impressive!
You must have the greatest sense of smell ever!
translation.es: ¡Debe tener el mejor sentido del olfato!

translation.en: Meh. Strange but true, doll,
I don't smell so good.
I really only use these pink doodads to feel around for justice.
translation.es: Solo uso estas cositas rosadaspara percibir justicia.

translation.en: So that means you must have incredible vision.
translation.es: Eso significaque debe tener una visión increíble.

translation.en: Well, technically, we're all blind.
Hold that thought. Lunch break.
Mm, worm.
Anyway, I'm an excellent digger, too.
translation.es: Como sea, también soy excelente cavador.

translation.en: Using my front paws as shovels
translation.es: Uso mis patas delanteras como palas

translation.en: to make tunnels that can go down a hundred feet or more.
translation.es: para hacer túneles que pueden bajarhasta 30 metros o más.

translation.en: So I know where all the bodies are buried.
translation.es: Sé dónde están enterradostodos los cuerpos.

translation.en: But are you sensitive to your clients' needs?
translation.es: Pero ¿es sensiblea las necesidades de sus clientes?

translation.en: Sensitive?
My pink, star-shaped nose
is the most sensitive touch organ of any mammal,
translation.es: es el órgano táctilmás sensible de cualquier mamífero,

translation.en: packed with over a hundred thousand nerve fibers.
translation.es: con más de cien mil fibras nerviosas.

translation.en: Okay, maybe I'll hire you.
I object...
if you don't.
-[phone rings] -[Buddy] Operators are standing by.
[baboon] Buddy Sparkle, please hold.
-Buddy Sparkle, please hold. -[phone rings]
-Buddy Sparkle, please hold! -[phone rings]
Call me today. Call me yesterday.
Yes, I can time travel.
translation.es: Sí, puedo viajar en el tiempo.

translation.en: [Mother Nature] In the decidedly more sultry climate of Southeastern Asia,
translation.es: En el clima más sofocantedel sudeste asiático,

translation.en: lives a creature you'll have to set an alarm
translation.es: vive una criaturapara la que tendrás que poner una alarma

translation.en: and grab your infrared goggles...
to witness.
I... am a pygmy... slow... loris.
Pyg... my.
I... have... a toxic... bite,
making me... the only... poisonous primate.
translation.es: lo que me convierteen el único primate venenoso.

translation.en: I sleep... during the day,
sometimes... up in a tree...
under my desk...
in my yurt.
I'm going through some stuff.
Someone should make fireworks... for the daytime...
translation.es: Alguien debería hacer fuegos artificialesdurante el día,

translation.en: that explode...
darkness.
Mind...
blown.
Ever notice how the most normal-looking critters
translation.es: ¿Han notado que las criaturas más normales

translation.en: are always secretly the biggest freaks?
Let's take a trip [Aussie voice] down under,
and get to the bottom of what makes this pearlfish so peculiar.
translation.es: y lleguemos al fondo de lo que haceque este perlero sea tan peculiar.

translation.en: The pearlfish seems like a nice enough fella,
translation.es: El perlero parece un tipobastante agradable,

translation.en: until it dawns on you
what he's about to do to this otherwise unassuming neighbor.
translation.es: lo que está a punto de hacerlea este, de otra forma, vecino modesto.

translation.en: That yellow creature next to it is one of my sea cucumbers,
translation.es: Esa criatura amarilla junto a éles uno de mis pepinos de mar,

translation.en: and that little hole is its tushy.
translation.es: y ese pequeño agujero es su trasero.

translation.en: The pearlfish wants to live inside the sea cucumber's rectum.
translation.es: El perlero quiere vivir en el interiordel recto del pepino de mar.

translation.en: This meet-cute starts off like any good rom-com,
translation.es: Este flechazo comienzacomo cualquier comedia romántica buena,

translation.en: with the pearlfish gauging the sea cucumber's tolerance...
translation.es: con el perlero midiendola tolerancia del pepino de mar

translation.en: ...by sniffing its breath.
Fun fact:
Sea cucumbers actually breathe out of their butts.
translation.es: Los pepinos de maren verdad respiran por sus traseros.

translation.en: And once it finds just the right spot,
translation.es: Y una vez que encuentra el lugar correcto,

translation.en: the pearlfish gears up to slide right into her BMs.
translation.es: el perlero se prepara para deslizarseentre sus cavidades.

translation.en: Now inside the cucumber's poo hamper,
translation.es: Ahora, dentro del recipientede caca del pepino,

translation.en: the pearlfish has a nice safe spot away from predators.
translation.es: el perlero tiene un lindo lugar segurolejos de los depredadores.

translation.en: But all that work does stimulate an appetite,
translation.es: Pero todo ese trabajo estimula el apetito,

translation.en: so the pearlfish will actually snack -on the cucumber's gonads... -[fart sound]
translation.es: así que el perlerose alimentará de las gónadas del pepino

translation.en: and other organs.
As many as 15 pearlfish have been found
living inside one poor sea cucumber's booty,
translation.es: viviendo dentro del traserínde un pobre pepino de mar,

translation.en: and they're also known to mate while inside there.
translation.es: y también se apareanmientras están adentro.

translation.en: [pearlfish] Yoo-hoo!
Pretty strange.
Am I right?
We move west, to the vastness of Africa,
translation.es: Nos vamos al oeste,a la inmensidad de África,

translation.en: the home office to a wide array of beautiful beasts.
translation.es: la sede central a una gran variedadde bestias bellas.

translation.en: But when it comes to the strangest things on the continent,
translation.es: Pero cuando se trata de las cosasmás extrañas del continente,

translation.en: beauty may only be skin deep
but ugly goes straight to the bone!
translation.es: pero lo feo va directo al hueso.

translation.en: I'm a marabou stork. Hi.
And we marabous play in smelly bogs.
translation.es: Y los marabúes jugamosen ciénagas apestosas.

translation.en: Look at us poor trash birds. Ugh!
Okay, who had the chicken salad?
translation.es: Bien, ¿de quién era la ensalada de pollo?

translation.en: Did you leave the tip, Jaden?
You see, I just gobble stuff up with--
Eww! Nasty!
What was that, a snake I just ate? Ugh!
translation.es: ¿Qué fue eso,una serpiente que me comí?

translation.en: Look, we marabous fight over food
translation.es: Mira, los marabúes luchamos por la comida

translation.en: like it's the last sticky bun at the bakery.
translation.es: como si fuera el último bolloen la panadería.

translation.en: Oh, good grief!
Look at our crazy necks!
You know what's so funny?
I dress so dapper in my tuxedo,
translation.es: Me visto tan elegante en mi esmoquin,

translation.en: yet, I'm not wearing any underwears.
I need underwears for my neck, don't I?
[chuckles] Oh, yes, I do!
Let me tell you folks, neck sacks are the next big thing.
translation.es: Déjenme decirles que los sacos de cuelloson la próxima tendencia.

translation.en: Trending!
Now supposedly we marabou storks poop on our own legs,
translation.es: Ahora, supuestamente, los marabúeshacemos popó en nuestras propias piernas,

translation.en: just to keep ourselves cool.
Guilty! [laughing] It's pretty classy, huh?
I soar through the air with my big beak!
translation.es: Vuelo por el aire con mi gran pico.

translation.en: I have big-beak energy!
Just like Adrien Brody,
or Maya Angelou,
or even Barbara Stanwyck!
-[flamingos squawking] -Hey!
What's up, lady flamingos?
Check out my... scrotum neck.
And... all the flamingos walk faster.
Great.
Marabou storks don't care.
translation.es: A los marabúes no les importa.

translation.en: The marabou stork.
Me!
I'm this ugly!
-End scene. -[classical music ends]
We now fly north,
from winged weirdos to a mythical titan,
translation.es: desde los raros alados a un titán mítico,

translation.en: landing in the frigid waters around Canada,
translation.es: y aterrizamosen las frías aguas de Canadá,

translation.en: Greenland, and Russia.
The narwhal is a curious pale-colored porpoise,
translation.es: El narval es una curiosa marsopade color pálido

translation.en: so mythical-looking,
it's sometimes known as "the unicorn of the sea."
translation.es: a veces conocida como"el unicornio del mar".

translation.en: The Inuit word "narwhal"
translates to, "the one point to the sky."
translation.es: se traduce como"el que apunta hacia el cielo",

translation.en: -[bell tinkling] -Or in English,
"the one who pops inflatable life rafts."
That horn is actually a tusk,
translation.es: De hecho, ese cuerno es un colmillo,

translation.en: with up to 10 million nerve endings inside.
translation.es: con hasta diez millonesde terminaciones nerviosas adentro.

translation.en: It helps detect fluctuations in water quality,
translation.es: Le ayuda a detectar fluctuacionesen la calidad del agua

translation.en: and locate food.
-Narwhals can change color as they age. -[computer game music continues]
translation.es: Los narvales cambian de colora medida que envejecen.

translation.en: Newborns and juveniles start out blue, black, and gray...
translation.es: Los recién nacidos y los juvenilescomienzan con el azul, negro y gris,

translation.en: -...but as they mature... -[music, bells]
...all narwhals eventually become almost completely white.
translation.es: todos los narvalesse vuelven casi completamente blancos.

translation.en: -[bells tinkle loudly] -There's really not enough I can say [shouts] about these pointy-headed porp-stars!
translation.es: ¡No hay mucho que decirde estas estrellas de cabeza puntiaguda!

translation.en: Ugh! Can you stop it already with those cheesy sound effects?
-I get it! -[porpoise blows]
It's a magical unicorn porpoise thingy,
translation.es: Es una marsopita tipo unicornio mágico

translation.en: and you're making mystical sounds.
-[sarcastically] Oh, so cute! -[bell tinkles]
No! It's annoying!
[huffs] So anyway,
don't sleep on a narwhal,
translation.es: no te duermas en un narval,

translation.en: and certainly don't sit on one,
translation.es: y claramente no te sientes en uno,

translation.en: -unless that's your thing. -[bells and springy sound effects]
Cut it out!
♪ I like-ah the pangolin ♪
♪ I like-ah the horny toad ♪
♪ I like-ah the man o' war ♪
♪ I like-ah the crab in the road ♪
♪ I like-ah the Jumping Stick ♪
♪ A super-engorged brown tick ♪
♪ A magical unicorn tang ♪
♪ A deer with a crazy fang ♪
♪ And they like yooou ♪
